original_text: Then the Israelites called out to the Lord for help. They said, “We have done bad things. We have turned away from the Lord and we have worshipped idols of Baal and images of Ashtoreth. Please save us from our enemies and we will worship you.”
korean_text: 백성이 여호와께 부르짖어 이르되 우리가 여호와를 버리고 바알들과 아스다롯을 섬김으로 범죄하였나이다 그러하오나 이제 우리를 원수들의 손에서 건져내소서 그리하시면 우리가 주를 섬기겠나이다 하매

sentences.original_text: Then the Israelites called out to the Lord for help
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 이스라엘 백성들은 주님께 도움을 구하기로 외쳤습니다

sentences.original_text: We have turned away from the Lord
and we have worshipped idols of Baal
Please save us from our enemies
